title: "I WILL NOT PASS OFF..." Poster Font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on this 3D block font. thanks,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mojo-posters-serenda348a_4125.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mojo-posters-serenda348a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110343/http:/typophile.com/files/mojo-posters-serenda348a.jpg) | 266.14 KB |
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
Similar to my own [Chromatose](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110343/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/gallery/top_picks/rating/descending/1/any_category/any_license/with_options/chromatose) if you want a free\* alternative. In fact, this looks like it could be reproduced quite closely with fontstruct.

- Lex

\*Read the licence

Another very close one is [Bevel](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110343/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/bevel_1), by Nathan Cox. In fact, I wouldnâ€™t be surprised if the designer of this poster had outlined and customized Bevel.
